titleStmt.title: A declaration of his Highnes council in Scotland, for the government thereof; concerning his Hignesse and the Council's order of the 15th of April, 1656. For the relief of debitors who are willing to satisfie their just debts; and for the moderating the rigor of comprizings, and the severity of proceedings by creditors against debitors in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

p.name: Edinburgh : Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the 22. day of May, 1656. Signed: in the name, and by order of the Council, Broghill, president.
Order to print dated: Thursday the 22. day of May, 1656. Signed: Emanuel Downing, Cl. of the Council.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
